UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational design, synthesis, antifungal evaluation and docking studies of antifungal peptide CGA-N12 analogues based on the target CtKRE9.
Literature.Author: Li R, Wu J, He F, Xu Q, Yin K, Li S, Li W, Wei A, Zhang L, Zhang XH, Zhang B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida tropicalis ATCC MYA-3404(MIC=100.66 ± 0.95µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=127.37 ± 0.51µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 13932(MIC=125µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=250µg/ml)
